Package ch.nolix.core.endPoint2

Class LocalEndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.core.endPoint2.EndPoint
        • ch.nolix.core.endPoint2.LocalEndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISender, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class LocalEndPoint
extends EndPoint
    A local end point can send messages to an other local end point.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LocalEndPoint​()
      Creates new local end point that will connect to an other new local end point.
      LocalEndPoint​(IEndPointTaker target)
      Creates new local end point that will connect to the given target.
      LocalEndPoint​(Server server, java.lang.String target)
      Creates new local end point that will connect to the given target on the given server.
